jp.go.aist.dggs.utils

Class MortonUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.go.aist.dggs.utils.MortonUtils

  • public class MortonUtils
extends Object
    Utilizing methods for PD code (one of type of Morton code). PD code is one of type of Morton code, especially DGGS Morton for the point cloud. DGGS is discrete global grid system.
    Author:
    TaehoonKim AIST DPRT, Research Assistant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MortonUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • getGreatestCommonAncestor

        public static String getGreatestCommonAncestor(String[] pdCodes)
        Searching a greatest common ancestor from given PD code list.
        Parameters:
        pdCodes - List of PD code
        Returns:
        A greatest common ancestor of PD codes

      • toPDCode

        public static String toPDCode(GeoCoordinates geoCoordinates,
                              int resolution)
        PD code (DGGS Morton for point cloud) encoding from 2-D (or 3-D) geodetic coordinates.
        Parameters:
        geoCoordinates - Geodetic coordinate (WGS 84 2-D (EPSG:4326) or WGS 84 3-D (EPSG:4979))
        resolution - Target resolution for PD code encoding
        Returns:
        PD code (DGGS Morton for point cloud)

      • toFaceCoordinate

        public static ISEA4DFaceCoordinates toFaceCoordinate(GeoCoordinates geoCoordinates)
        Face coordinate encoding from 2-D (or 3-D) geodetic coordinates.
        Parameters:
        geoCoordinates - Geodetic coordinate (WGS 84 2-D (EPSG:4326) or WGS 84 3-D (EPSG:4979))
        Returns:
        ISEA4D face coordinates

      • toFaceCoordinate

        public static ISEA4DFaceCoordinates toFaceCoordinate(ISEA4DFaceCoordinates faceCoordinates,
                                                     int resolution)
        Get face coordinates according to a given resolution. This function will work when target resolution is less than given ISEA4D face coordinates' resolution.
        Parameters:
        faceCoordinates - Given ISEA4D face coordinates
        resolution - Target resolution
        Returns:
        ISEA4D face coordinates

      • toGeoCoordinate

        public static GeoCoordinates toGeoCoordinate(String pdCode,
                                             int resolution)
        PD code (Point cloud DGGS code, DGGS Morton for point cloud) decoding to 3-dimensional coordinates (WGS 84 3D, EPSG:4979)
        Parameters:
        pdCode - PD code, DGGS Morton for point cloud
        resolution - Target resolution for PD code decoding
        Returns:
        3-dimensional geodetic coordinate (WGS 84 3D, EPSG:4979)

      • toGeoCoordinate

        public static GeoCoordinates toGeoCoordinate(String pdCode)
        PD code (Point cloud DGGS code, DGGS Morton for point cloud) decoding to 3-dimensional coordinates (WGS 84 3D, EPSG:4979) Target resolution is MAX_RESOLUTION (=32)
        Parameters:
        pdCode - DGGS Morton for point cloud
        Returns:
        3-dimensional geodetic coordinate (WGS 84 3D, EPSG:4979)

      • toGeoCoordinate

        public static GeoCoordinates toGeoCoordinate(ISEA4DFaceCoordinates faceCoordinates)
        ISEA4D face coordinates decoding to 3-dimensional coordinates (WGS 84 3D, EPSG:4979) This function uses a given ISEA4D face coordinates' resolution.
        Parameters:
        faceCoordinates - ISEA4D face coordinates
        Returns:
        3-dimensional geodetic coordinate (WGS 84 3D, EPSG:4979)

      • toGeoCoordinate

        public static GeoCoordinates toGeoCoordinate(ISEA4DFaceCoordinates faceCoordinates,
                                             int resolution)
        ISEA4D face coordinates decoding to 3-dimensional coordinates (WGS 84 3D, EPSG:4979) This function uses a given target resolution.
        Parameters:
        faceCoordinates - ISEA4D face coordinates
        resolution - Target resolution for face coordinates decoding
        Returns:
        3-dimensional geodetic coordinate (WGS 84 3D, EPSG:4979)
